content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group 1 to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns > this pattern is part of my 6 different c2c crochet stitches vol 2 /patterns/sources/6-different-c2c-crochet-stitches-vol-2 > ebook save and get the ebook **you can find the video tutorial for the square version here ** https //youtu be/7es9uilj2s8 the cornerstone blanket is made using the crochet corner to corner moss stitch with added bean stitches for a unique texture stitches used in this different c2c blanket pattern bean st single_crochet chain the corner to corner method is my favorite way of working blankets it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go ** the pdf pattern provides an easy to follow step-by-step photo tutorial and a video tutorial for the square version ** **in the pdf version you will find instructions for both a square and a rectangle version ** you can work this pattern with any yarn weight and a suitable hook - skill level - intermediate - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - the pattern is made with worsted #4 yarn and a 5 0 / h mm hook although you can use any yarn with a suitable hook - amount yarn needed 1 000gr/1 600m/1 750yds - finished size you can work this blanket to your desired size square - 30x30 76x76cm rectangle - 30x35 76x89cm the pattern is available for free on my blog if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2024 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
